aws_spot_instance_request.description: Provides a Spot Instance Request resource.

spot_price.description: The maximum price to request on the spot market.

launch_group.description: A launch group is a group of spot instances that launch together and terminate together.

block_duration_minutes.description: The required duration for the Spot instances, in minutes. This value must be a multiple of 60 (60, 120, 180, 240, 300, or 360).

instance_interruption_behaviour.description: Indicates whether a Spot instance stops or terminates when it is interrupted. Default is `terminate` as this is the current AWS behaviour.

valid_until.description: The end date and time of the request, in UTC [RFC3339](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339#section-5.8

valid_from.description: The start date and time of the request, in UTC [RFC3339](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339#section-5.8

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource.
